Activator - Interface in com.anji.integration
Although any object taking and returning double arrays can implement this, it is meant to be a simple neural net interface where the arrays are input and output activation patterns.

Returns the result of a logical AND over all inputs, where an input value greater than or equal to 0.5 is considered logical true, and less than 0.5 false.
